contents.content: _{You must take three archetype feats before you can start another.}
_{Assurance: May choose to take 10 rather than roll.}
_{Deduct hardness, then apply remaining damage to both shield and yourself.}
contents.title: _{Shield Block}

contents.content: _{Imprecise scent allows you to find creatures within 30ft.}
_{+2 Perception to locate a hidden creatures.}
_{Communicate with creatures on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on animals and to make very simple Requests of them.}
_{Spend an action to command your animal companion.}
_{Otherwise they will act as they please.}
_{Animals get two actions which they take on your turn, and no reactions.}
